sentences.sContent: The wolf clawed at the tree and howled the whole night.
sentences.sCn: 那只狼在那颗树上抓挠，还嗥叫了整整一个晚上。

phrases.pCn: 羊角锤；木工锤；燕尾服；拔钉锤

words.tran: 抓（claw的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to tear or pull at something, using claws or your fingers
a sharp curved nail on an animal, bird, or some insects
